org._7hills.liueri19.game

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • org._7hills.liueri19.game.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    The Board where Pieces rest on and the game would be played.
    Author:
    liueri19

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Constructs a chess board with standard setup.
      Board(boolean doSetUp)
      Constructs a chess board with setup optional.

      • getPieceAt

        public Piece getPieceAt(char file,
                        int rank)
        Iterates through the list of pieces currently on the board and returns the piece at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        file - the file of the piece represented as char
        rank - the rank of the piece represented as int
        Returns:
        the Piece object with the specified file and rank, or null if none has the specified value

      • getMove

        public Move getMove(int moveNum)
        Returns the Move object at the specified index in history. Note that the index starts at 0, and each Move will occupy an index in history, therefore the index is not the same as the move number in standard transcript.
        Parameters:
        moveNum - the index of the desired Move object
        Returns:
        the Move object at the specified index in history

      • getCurrentMoveNum

        public int getCurrentMoveNum()
        Returns the number of Move objects recorded.
        Returns:
        the number of Move objects recorded (the size of the history)

      • isSquareAttacked

        public boolean isSquareAttacked(boolean color,
                                int file,
                                int rank)
        Returns true if the specified square is being attacked by the opponent of color, and false otherwise.

        isSquareAttacked(true, 1, 1) returns true if square A1 is being attacked by black; likewise, isSquareAttacked(false, 1, 1) returns true if square A1 is being attacked by white.

        Parameters:
        color - the color of the friendly side
        file - the file of the square
        rank - the rank of the square
        Returns:
        true if the specified square is being attacked by the opponent of color, and false otherwise

      • isInCheck

        public boolean isInCheck(boolean color)
        Returns true if the King of the specified color is in check, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        color - the color of the specified king
        Returns:
        true if the King of the specified color is in check, false otherwise

      • updatePieces

        protected void updatePieces()
        Call updatePiece() on all Piece objects currently on the board.

      • revert

        protected void revert(int numMoves)
        Revert the specified number of moves.
        Note that "move" is not to be confused with "turn". In this context, one move will be considered as one action taken by one side. Two moves make one full turn.
        Parameters:
        numMoves - the number of moves to revert

      • revert

        protected void revert()
        Revert one move.
